title: Building Authentic Confidence
description: Developing genuine self-assurance from the inside out

questions.question: What is the relationship between authentic confidence and arrogance?
options: They are the same thing expressed differently
Arrogance masks insecurity while authentic confidence is grounded in self-worth
Authentic confidence always leads to arrogance over time
Arrogance is just more extreme confidence

questions.question: Which approach builds more sustainable confidence?
options: Focusing on external validation and achievements
Pretending to be confident until you feel it
Avoiding situations that make you uncomfortable

questions.question: What role does action play in building confidence?
options: You should wait until confident to take action
Action builds confidence through evidence of capability
Action is only helpful after confidence is established
Action has no relationship to confidence

subtitle: Real confidence comes from within
